enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: If true, the service will be enabled and exported to the proxy.

favorite.name: Favorite
favorite.description: If true, the service will be shown on the Dashboard.

manual.name: Manual
manual.description: If true, do not generate file, keep existing.

domain.name: Domain name
domain.description: Domain name of the service including TLD. If you only use one, only put it in the Defaults field.

subdomain.name: Subdomain
subdomain.description: Service will be accessed through 'subdomain.domain'. Only one 'None' subdomain will be permitted per domain and will be acceessed through 'domain'.

https.name: HTTPS
https.description: If true, the the service will be accessed with HTTPS protocol.

model.name: Template
model.description: If filled, the selected template will be used. Else, the service will be assumed to be secured on its own.

ip.name: IP adress
ip.description: If provided, this IP will be used to access the service, else 127.0.0.1 will be used.

port.name: Port
port.description: Port exposed by the service. If not provided, defaults to 80 for HTTP and 443 for HTTPS.
